code: import palette from'theme/palette';export var data={labels:['1 Aug','2 Aug','3 Aug','4 Aug','5 Aug','6 Aug'],datasets:[{label:'This year',backgroundColor:palette.primary.main,data:[18,5,19,27,29,19,20]},{label:'Last year',backgroundColor:palette.neutral,data:[11,20,12,29,30,25,13]}]};export var options={responsive:true,maintainAspectRatio:false,animation:false,legend:{display:false},cornerRadius:20,tooltips:{enabled:true,mode:'index',intersect:false,borderWidth:1,borderColor:palette.divider,backgroundColor:palette.white,titleFontColor:palette.text.primary,bodyFontColor:palette.text.secondary,footerFontColor:palette.text.secondary},layout:{padding:0},scales:{xAxes:[{barThickness:12,maxBarThickness:10,barPercentage:0.5,categoryPercentage:0.5,ticks:{fontColor:palette.text.secondary},gridLines:{display:false,drawBorder:false}}],yAxes:[{ticks:{fontColor:palette.text.secondary,beginAtZero:true,min:0},gridLines:{borderDash:[2],borderDashOffset:[2],color:palette.divider,drawBorder:false,zeroLineBorderDash:[2],zeroLineBorderDashOffset:[2],zeroLineColor:palette.divider}}]}};
